title: Love's Bewitching Thief
description: All Lysie did was steal the handsome Argon’s jewels - twice. She hadn’t bargained on being trapped on his ship. Marten had her now, a Felys female with tortoiseshell hair, a purr to curl a man’s toes – and coming dangerously into heat. The cyborg just wants to kill her.
author: Angela Verdenius
